entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ConfigurationBinder Source Generator doesn't call setters in same way reflection based ConfigurationBinder does #96873
    9.0.0
  • [monovm] Assertion at object.c:657, condition `lock->done' not met #96872
    8.0.x
  • [wasm][wasi] No main function should be required when building a library #96869
  • iOS NativeAOT testing app failing to build in performance pipeline #96868
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] AOT: OOM when compiling `System.Numerics.Tensors.Tests.dll` #96866
  • [wasm] AOT: System.Numerics.Tensors.Net8.Tests - aot-instances.dll with exit code 137 #96865
  • [wasm] `NativeLibrary` doesn't include file #96864
  • [wasm] Setting `WasmBuildNative` to false produces no output wasm binary #96863
  • [wasm][wasi] incorrecly adds imports that aren't needed #96862
  • [API Proposal]: Attribute model for feature APIs #96859
  • ILLink doesn't keep most specific static default interface method #96855
  • ILLink doesn't keep static default interface method for uninstantiated types #96854
  • [wasm] UnmanagedCallersOnly generates incorrect wasm export types #96853
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Gauge metric creation should support async callback signature #96850
  • Request for Implementation of DbException.SqlState and DbException.IsTransient in System.Data.Odbc #96849
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Creating Opposite SearchValues #96844
  • [browser][AOT] wasm-ld : error : initial memory too small #96840
    9.0.0
  • The StringBuilder.Append(Char[], Int32, Int32) method call throws the System.ArgumentOutOfRange exception in a valid situation when the app targets .NET 8 and built in the Release configuration #96839
  • Profiled casts: isinst is no longer hoisted #96837
  • Unexpected reordering of memory allocation when using GC.GetAllocatedBytesForCurrentThread() when running optimized #96836
  • build mono failed "warning d9025 overriding '/EHa' with '/EHa-'" #96832
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 3 Regressions in LINQ #96852
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 3 Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.Perf_Regex_Industry_RustLang_Sherlock #96851
  • MethodDef validation seems miss to validate the last arg in `validateTokenSig` #96831
  • [libs][iOS] AdvSimdEncode hits PlatformNotSupportedException #96828
  • System.Diagnostics.Activity memory footprint concern #96822
    Future

Closed

  • Strong type support in Microsoft.Extensions.Logging #61947
    Future
  • Enable Remaining Libraries Tests in TestReadyToRun Pipeline #95928
    9.0.0
  • Incorrect method return on Android in Release mode #96264
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] AOT: `System.Numerics.Tensors.Tests` - `aot-instances.dll with exit code 137` #96631
  • Trimmed winforms app crashes #96516
  • [hot reload] Could not parse field signature 0a0008a9 due to: Could not resolve type with token 010001f3 from typeref #90332
    8.0.0
  • DAC fails to enumerate heap objects on .NET 7+ due to GC Regions #96568
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: KMAC #93494
    9.0.0
  • Assert failure: !"Debugger doesn't support OOM scenarios." #12990
    Future
  • Building clr subset emits tons of command line warnings #68658
    9.0.0
  • [OCSP Stapling] OCSP Reponse has expired in .NET Linux #95567
    7.0.x
  • RemoveAllKeyed Requires Equality Operator #95754
    9.0.0
  • .NET 8.0.1: No symbols for osx-arm64 Mono #96845
  • `TraceUtils.CopyStringDictionary()` is broken #96092
    9.0.0
  • ClientWebSocket.ConnectAsync() does not work on Mac #90258
  • [MT][browser] `WithExecutionMode` fails #91661
    9.0.0
  • Add test for LTTng config parser #12994
    Future
  • Numerous GlobalizationNative P/Invokes in System.Private.CoreLib.dll don't have a corresponding native function anymore #96251
    9.0.0
  • Introduce an R2R File Format change that can contain multiple assemblies #12967
    Future
  • Test_EventSource_EtwManifestGeneration* tests failing in CI #48798
    Future
  • [Blazor] Unable to debug in lazy loaded assemblies #96736

PullRequests

Created

  • TryAddEnumerable test avoid false negatives #96871
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Preserve debug info for merged returns #96870
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove IBC and Ngen related structures and comments #96867
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Gen0 segment should always be reported as Gen0 for DacHeapWalker #96861
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-consider, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • Remove helperframe marshal #96860
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Add non-portable RID to list of known runtime packs instead of overwriting #96858
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Change allocation of `MethodData` structures to do less unnecessary work #96857
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Ensure that JSON properties can be skipped without buffering their entire contents. #96856
    area-System.Text.Json, tenet-performance, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] ServiceKey comparisons use Equals for matching #96847
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Fix concurrency issue in TypeDescriptor GetProperties() and GetConverter() #96846
    area-System.ComponentModel
  • JIT: Generalize `optSetPreheaderWeight` #96843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] remove legacy js interop #96841
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Fix server-side OCSP stapling on Linux #96838
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.x
  • Optimize BigInteger.CompareTo() #96835
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Fix processing `--substitutions` #96834
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [libs] Skip AdvSimdEncode on Mono #96829
    area-System.Buffers
  • Don't copy runner to test output during regular builds #96826
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono][debugger] Fix debug lazy loaded assemblies when webcil is enabled #96825
    Servicing-consider, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.x

Merged

  • Add ActiveIssue Annotations to Failing TestReadyToRun Tests and Reenable the Executables #96721
    disabled-test, area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • [release/7.0-staging] Fix build of IJW test after VS upgrade #96788
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Move arm64 insOpts entries into insScalableOpts #96692
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Adding vectorized implementations of Log2 to Vector64/128/256/512 #96455
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Detect static default interface methods in illink #96821
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Gen0 segment should always be reported as Gen0 for DacHeapWalker #96640
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • JIT: Hoist in newly recognized loops #96753
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement KMAC #96025
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, cryptographic-docs-impact, 9.0.0
  • Remove NDirectWriteableData #96824
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Simplify methodtable #96466
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Prevent access violation in ThreadExceptionState::EnumChainMemoryRegions #96823
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Change ampere queue name #96803
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • ServiceKey comparisons use Equals for matching #95807
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Fix `CopyStringDictionary` #96093
    area-System.Configuration, community-contribution
  • Slightly improve profiled casts #96731
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][debugger] Test for: set breakpoint in partial class defined in separate files #96735
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm] Enable MT in S.Linq.Parallel #96215
    arch-wasm, area-System.Linq.Parallel
  • STJ/JsonPropertyDictionary: eagerly initialize _propertyDictionary if known capacity #96769
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT] - CancellationToken for JSWebWorker #96696
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix fast-path support for ignoring nullable value types #96669
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.x
  • Add entire issuer chain to trusted X509_STORE when stapling OCSP_Response #96792
    area-System.Net.Security, 9.0.0
  • Reduce asm size of CollectionsMarshal.AsSpan #96773
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Do not include `NativeSinks.NativeAot.cs` without `FeaturePerfTracing` #96811
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Move setting variables to HelixPreCommands #96713
    area-Infrastructure
  • Disable EventSource manifest gen tests on stress runs. #96816
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, test-enhancement, 9.0.0
  • [mono][debugger] Fix debug lazy loaded assemblies when webcil is enabled #96800
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono

Updated

  • Implement remaining unimplemented APIs for Builder types #96805
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • [IGNORE] Testing `Move to building with the 9.0 SDK and move our ToolCurrent TFM to 9.0` PR #96459
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Build-mono
  • [release/7.0] Fix server-side OCSP stapling on Linux #96808
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 7.0.x
  • JIT: Align newly recognized loops #96756
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Set FlagNetStandard1XDependencies=true and fix issues #96795
    needs-area-label
  • Hardware accelerated implementation of Quaternion multiply #96624
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • JIT: Unroll newly recognized loops #96752
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove the concept of packable fields from EEClass #96699
    area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT: Clone newly recognized loops #96754
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • extend MemoryCache with `ICollection<object> Keys` property #94992
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Caching, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] WebSocket thread affinity & server initiated close #96618
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Add runtime support for Swift calling convention on x64 and arm64 #94764
    area-VM-meta-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Inline properties during importation #96325
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • update snapcraft.yaml for jan releases #96418
    area-Snap
  • Make changes nescessary to build IL asm grammar with Bison. #89704
    area-ILTools-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Add TextWriter.CreateBroadcasting #96732
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-author-action, 9.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Add SSA transformation and SSA based optimization #96315
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix native memory leak on OCSP_Response #96577
    area-System.Security, 8.0.x
  • [release/7.0-staging] Fix native memory leak on OCSP_Response #96578
    area-System.Security, 7.0.x
  • [browser][HybridGlobalization] Improve speed performance of IndexOf and LastIndexOf text APIs with HybridGlobalization mode #95583
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Move to building with the 9.0 SDK and move our ToolCurrent TFM to 9.0 #95980
    area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • Refine Bin/Hex parsing of BigInteger #95543
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT] Use auto thread dispatch in HTTP & WS #95370
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • KeyedCollection debug view doesn't work #96261
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • VM: Include generic instantiations in stack frames #96440
    area-System.Diagnostics, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Enable On Stack Replacement #96558
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [NativeAOT] ObjWriter: Fix over-alignment of .eh_frame entries #96817
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fixing SignedXml.CheckSignature for enveloped signature with `#xpointer(/)` Reference #95404
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Inline TLS access for windows/x64 #89472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Added designated output instruction emitters #96741
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Add Arm64 encodings for SVE IF_SVE_CQ_4A_A to IF_SVE_HT_4A group #96214
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • JIT: Allow BBJ_COND false target to diverge from bbNext in layout optimization phase #96609
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement Interlocked for small types. #92974
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: Pass field's owner to getFieldType #96794
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix assertion at System.Numerics.BigIntegerCalculator.Multiply #96744
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-11
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Application size #2484
  • Occasional SEHException in ObjWriter #1316
  • Linker warnings on OSX #956
  • NativeAOT: ILC can produce object file that crashes clang 11 (ld) on macOS 10.14 Mojave #1190

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Post-merge tasks #2472
  • [NativeAOT] Best way to track down app size bloat? #1269

PullRequests

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Remove USE_SDL option as no longer needed #2483

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] A couple of missing symbol fixes #2482

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • What is the difference between build, build --no-self-contained and build --self-contained false #37931
  • A date in the Hebrew calendar leads to an error when log file is created #37932

Closed

  • Mistake in Spanish localization for the CLI #37537
  • Gauge Metric should have async callback option #37940

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2351828 #37948
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #37946
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #37945
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update the more test frameworks #37925
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Unset SuppressTfmSupportBuildWarnings #37897
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2350475 #37856
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • dotnet tool run and install roll-forward option #37231
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Use runtime packs for NativeAOT on .NET 9.0 or higher #37872
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • [release/8.0.1xx] [Wasm] Disable accelerated builds in Visual Studio for wasm projects #37900
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove TaskWithAssemblyResolveHooks #37913
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Blazor] Disable accelerated builds in Visual Studio for Blazor webassembly projects (7.0) #37794
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [Blazor] Disable accelerated builds in Visual Studio for Blazor webassembly projects (6.0) #37793
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Let runtime supply the portable RID graph #36807
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #37851
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-11
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Let ref structs implement interfaces and substitute into type parameters #7608
  • [Proposal]: Add `private` and `namespace` accessibility modifiers for top-level types. #6794
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Breaking change warnings #7189
    Working Set

PullRequests

Merged

  • Collection expressions: use iteration type for convertibility of element types #7783

Updated

  • Collection expressions: require applicable constructor and Add method for target type implementing IEnumerable #7802
  • Disallow method parameter conversion of `ref` to `in`/`ref readonly` #7820
  • Interceptors open issues for C# 13 #7835

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • "csc.exe" exited with code -2146232797 when constructing an invalid implicitly type array of Func #71593
  • Trailing type name hint is part of character selection when renaming variables #71582
  • Cloning `DocumentId` results in impossibility to get the valid result of `GetSourceGeneratedDocumentAsync` #71581
  • Rationalize FlushAsync taking a CancellationToken in `net8.0` #71580

Closed

  • Consider using RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan as part of stackalloc initialization #69325
    17.9
  • [Source Generator] `Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.ISymbol.Name` is missing `@` #71577

PullRequests

Created

  • Collection expressions: require applicable constructor and Add method for target type implementing IEnumerable #71592
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update code to use collection expressions #71591
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Core test #71590
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Preserve the whitespaces when rewriting an inheritdoc #71589
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Merge latest bits from `main` into `features/roles` #71588
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove properties from DocumentSpan #71587
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Unify how we pass and choose pools #71584
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Turn Semantic Snippets on by default #71583
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove `ExternalAccess.RazorCompiler` #71579
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix rethrowing in nested async catch #71578
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update MSBuild.StructuredLogger #71576
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • Small bits of project file cleanup. #71585
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Collection expressions: require [CollectionBuilder] target iteration type from GetEnumerator instance method #71574
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Don't hard select promoted default item if there's filter text #71480
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Correct change detection when projects not supporting EnC are added/removed #71586
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • Speed up integration test build by only building required dependencies #71289
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Fork diag/code-action tests to ones without editor dep. 7/N #71564
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add a test for 'Params Collections.' #71572
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Use runtime helper `CreateSpan` for `stackalloc` of non-byte arrays #71261
    Area-Compilers, Code Gen Quality, untriaged, Next
  • Fork diag/code-action tests to ones without editor dep. 6/N #71563
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Simplify how RunTests handles TFMs #71556
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Fork diag/code-action tests to ones without editor dep. 5/N #71562
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fork diag/code-action tests to ones without editor dep. 4/N #71561
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fork diag/code-action tests to ones without editor dep. 3/N #71560
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Optimize nullable value type constant comparison codegen #68069
    Area-Compilers, Code Gen Quality, untriaged, Next
  • Fork diag/code-action tests to ones without editor dep. 2/N #71557
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge main to features/lsp_configuration #71573
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Collection expressions: method type re-inference #71214
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Move EnC tests to Features layer #71525
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Update ILVerify bits #71544
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge main to features/lsp_configuration #71594
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Support XAML LSP in VS Code #70170
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Use Microsoft.VisualStudio.Sdk meta-package and clean up versions and package references #71111
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Invoke code mapper via reflection #70667
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fixes nested code actions in LSP bug #71456
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Improve codegen for concatenation of `string` and `char` #70971
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.9
  • Do not compile all types during ENC #71254
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix implementing abstract method with type parameter constaint on specific reference type #71287
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix ref field load in assignment #71566
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Move to 8.0 #71507
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Start local function analysis in unreachable state #71506
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • Delay slicing in list pattern until all other element patterns are matched #70615
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.9
  • Reduce allocations when creating CompositeText instances. #71493
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update other BCL to 8.0.0 #71516
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Disallow `ref` to `in`/`ref readonly` method parameter conversion #71531
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters
  • Consider `params` and default values when comparing signatures #71380
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, New Language Feature - Default lambda parameters
  • Separate the process of creating an event accessor parameter and the process of figuring out its type. #71497
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Break Solution-checksums into a checksums for pure-state vs source-generator state #71396
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Run integration tests on helix #71328
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Semantic search #71268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NewtonsoftJsonInputFormatter will fail deserializing stream with byte order mark #53315
  • Perf regression: json, mapaction #53312
  • Perf improvement: mvc #53311
  • AngularCliMiddleware is not working with the new Angular CLI's build system #53307
  • NamedPipeTransportOptions should support multiple PipeSecurity (DACL) #53306
  • Poor handling of circuit handlers with unresolved dependencies in Blazor #53300
    Backlog
  • Dev tunnels - project bound configuration #53298
  • When token expires the authenticationservice,js gets a new token but not with all of the same scopes as the original request #53296
  • Flakey test POST_ServerAbort_ClientReceivesAbort #53294

Closed

  • Render Mode Auto Interactive does not wait for next access of a component before swapping to WASM #52899
    8.0.x
  • [extensions] dependency out of date #53295
  • HubConnectionBuilder Connection to UDS (Unix Domain Socket) #46334
    Backlog
  • Perf improvement: json, plaintext #53206
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps, plaintext #53261
  • Blazor webassembly application is showing wrong culture #53233
  • CascadingValueSource<T> should automatically invoke NotifyChangedAsync for INotifyPropertyChanged values #53257
  • Problem providing Access Token to HttpClient in Interactive Server mode #52390
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Globalization for Server/Auto Resets After Initial Load #52885
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Blazor Web Assembly Stand Alone generates connection reset exceptions #53172
  • For server-side Blazor, consider packing the reference frames more tightly #12306
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Trim dotnet-watch and Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebAssembly.DevServer package content #26448
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Refactor NavigationManager by concept area #27456
    .NET 9 Planning
  • When Http2Limits.HeaderTableSize set to zero results in COMPRESSION ERROR (9) #53174
  • PreventDefault and StopPropagation behave unexpectedly when placed on a component (not HTML element) #30969
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Figure out best way to reuse browser instances #31111
    .NET 9 Planning
  • EventCallback closures lead to increased diff size and decreased Blazor performance. #31755
    .NET 9 Planning
  • CreateInboundActivityHandler override in .net 8 RC2 not being called #51934
    8.0.x
  • Make it possible to resolve the method info from the specific delegate type when using AddRouteHandler #53171
    9.0-preview1
  • Blazor Text Page: Issue with Displaying Russian Text in Source Code #53056
  • What happen with DataProtectorTokenProvider? #53305
  • Cannot get static files like js from razor class library in Production environment #53285
  • Error Headers are read-only, response has already started .net 8 blazor #53240
  • InputSelect not work in blazor .net 8 #53242
  • [Blazor] Modernize and Centralize our JS build infrastructure #52964
  • [Blazor] Centralize JS dependencies #52963
  • [dotnet-sdk-9.0.100-alpha.1.24055.6] Some web app pages load failed with js errors #53264
  • [Feature Requested] Add Auto Change Layout Direction (Rtl , Ltr) By Button Or Change Culture #53292
  • InputBase should clear validation message store on Dispose for dynamic forms #44531
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Microsoft.IdentityModel.Protocols.OpenIdConnect 7.1.2 #53243
  • API converts SCREAMING_SNAKE_CASE to screaminG_SNAKE_CASE #53126
  • HttpContext is not null for the fist time call in OnInitializedAsync() #53263
  • Blazor InputRadio is broken by IHandleEvent #52069
    8.0.x
  • System.PlatformNotSupportedException: EventLog access is not supported on this platform #53106

PullRequests

Created

  • [Blazor] Allow `null` parameter values to be supplied to interactive components via enhanced page update #53317
    area-blazor
  • Change static readonly properties to const #53316
    area-identity, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Image with FontImageSource not displaying expected font icon in Android and embedded MAUI when Finish called on initial launch Activity. #19846
  • ListView with IsGroupingEnabled = true throws System.NullReferenceException in Android outside of single project structure #19845
  • Page.DisplayAlert and Page.DisplayActionSheet do not work in MAUI Embedded Use Case #19843
  • MAUI .NET 8 "duplicate file names" build error when an app's libraries use NuGets that have .svg images #19840
  • ScrollToAsync does not work on nested ScrollView in Android #19835
  • [iOS] Images from paths refuse to load in UI #19833
  • Menu item is not disappear when switch on another tab #19831
  • The UI is shrinking after setting the SoftInputMode to AdjustResize #19825
  • HeadContent not working with maui with blazor in release #19822
  • MediaPicker CapturePhotoAsync broken on Android in nightly builds #19821
  • Implicit styling on .NET 8 is being ignored on the page level #19820
    Backlog
  • Entry hides while keyboard popup on Android. #19819
  • [MAUI] Stuck when entering/exiting G6 page #19818
    Backlog
  • [iOS][NativeAOT] Stand up testing on devices #19817
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Image Tapped is not triggered when setting HeightRequest to the Image #19816
  • I am getting Error loading font 'Assets/Fonts/Tahoma.ttf' in my log file, though app is working #19815
  • O aplicativo não foi compilado #19814

Closed

  • [regression/8.0.0-rc.1.9171] RefreshView indicator hidden behind Navigation bar #17610
    .NET 8 SR2
  • [WinUI] Image with FontImageSource is not displayed properly when using a custom font in an unpackaged app #19608
  • Custom Title Bar Colors not working after migrating to .NET 8 #19787
  • Label with TextType="Html" looks completely different on iOS and Android #19802
  • AppCompat-Types can't be resolved during creation of Binding-Wrapper classes for .aar #19830
  • [net9.0] Re-enable Tizen Support on net9 Branch #19429
    .NET 9 Planning
  • [Azure pipelines] Error XA5300: The Android SDK directory could not be found #19829
  • Custom Shell.TitleView content not positioned correctly on iOS #14558
    Backlog
  • [net7.0 / net8.0] [iOS] Memory leak when CollectionView.ItemsSource changes #14664
    .NET 8 SR2
  • Binding works in Debug Mode but fails in Release Mode #19155
  • Maui-Blazor (Hybrid) MacCatalyst app will not run on older MacOS #19808
    Backlog
  • The size of the assembly varies between .NET 7.0 and .NET 8.0. #19362
  • MAUI pack problem #19595
  • [Android] Navigation performance issue #17576
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [net9.0] Update net9.0 with main #19847
  • Fix Android MediaPicker Photo capture logic #19844
  • Add missing AbsoluteLayout section to layout architecture doc #19841
  • [Catalyst] Allow setting of CancelButtonColor on SearchBar when using Mac Idiom #19838
    platform/macOS 🍏, area/controls 🎮
  • [ci] Bump XCode to 15.2.0 #19836
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, testing-infrastructure
  • [Android, Windows] Correctly scale Button image #19834
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Update MSBuild.StructuredLogger #19824
    community ✨

Merged

  • Fix incorrect defaults when adding non-BindableObject as AbsoluteLayout child #19839
  • Fix SetProgressViewOffset on SwipeRefreshLayout #19767
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-refreshview
  • Improves performance on BindableProperty #17756
    area/Xaml </>, community ✨, stale, Under Consideration
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8 #19826
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [net9.0] Enable tizen #19679
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19813
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Enable CA1822 in Core and convert eligible methods to static #19800

Updated

  • [android] improve performance of Shell flyout opening #15733
    platform/android 🤖, area/perf 🏎️, .NET 9 Planning
  • Remove calls to scoped services on root provider #19593
    area/hosting 🧩
  • Avoid zero-length array allocations #19300
    area/perf 🏎️, community ✨, stale
  • Fix Action Sheets for macOS #19629
  • Fix condition to bundle Microsoft.Maui.Essentials.dll in app extensions on Apple platforms. Fixes #19756. #19757
  • Picker ItemsSource fixes #19728
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • Make `PointerOver` to have higher priority than `Focused` state #19812
    community ✨
  • Add basic docs for ScrollView implementations #19766
    area/docs 📓, area/layout 🔲
  • [Hosting] Register ImageSource services as KeyedServices #19641
    area/app-size 🤏, area/perf 🏎️, .NET 9 Planning
  • PanGesture notify Completed event moving outside View limits #15700
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, stale, area/gestures, .NET 8 SR2
  • Add support for running Appium tests with BrowserStack #18312
    area/testing

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Scaffolding a DbContext generates multiple warnings of "Non-nullable properties are uninitialized". #32792
  • Default to MigrationsAssembly for migrations add (if specified) #32791
  • EFCore.Design.Tests sometimes fail to start cleanly #32787
  • ComplexTypeBulkUpdatesSqlServerTest failing on main #32786
    9.0.0
  • Clean table alias generation and generate unique aliases up-front #32784
  • Directly support value converters and comparers that don't use expressions #32783
  • Dotnet-ef mismatch causes apply Entity Framework migration fails when publishing an individual web app. #32782
  • Removing and re-adding to a many-to-many nav collection with intervening change detection removes relationship from database #32780
  • Compiled Models in EF8 generates different SQL #32779

Closed

  • EF & MAUI Android Release - Format of the initialization string does not conform to specification starting at index 0 #32553
    Backlog
  • MAUI Blazor - database no longer works in Android Release mode #32040
  • ExecuteUpdate with OwnsOne property in target table fails in efcore 7.0.12 #32053
    9.0.0
  • Unable to Scaffold DBContext if tables in SQL Server have certain names #32571
    8.0.2
  • Allow passing complex type instances to `ExecuteUpdate` #32058
    9.0.0
  • FluentAPI configuration PrimitiveCollection on OwnedNavigationBuilder returns PropertyBuilder instead of PrimitiveCollectionBuilder #32601
    8.0.2
  • The value of HostingEnvironment.ApplicationName is incorrect during EF migrations #32202
  • Update-Database in VS' Package Manager Console is very slow on long scripted migrations #16858
  • dotnet ef migrations script with SDK not on path failing #14225

PullRequests

Created

  • Adjusted DbContext scaffolding of DbSets. #32793
  • Don't discover DbFunctions when building ad-hoc model #32790
  • Stop stripping new lines from migration script literals #32788
  • Redo SQL table alias management #32785

Merged

  • Fix IncludeExpression pruning for nested owned entities in ExecuteUpdate/Delete #32773
  • Fix test baseline due to bad merge #32789
    auto-merge
  • Handle updating complex type properties in ExecuteUpdate #32499
  • Fix typos on DeleteBehavior.cs #32781
